sprykerComponent.name: suggestion-links-list
sprykerComponent.readme:
Displays a list of links (to product or page) in the search drop-down menu if there is a match with the entered value.

Code sample

{% include molecule('suggestion-links-list', 'CatalogPage') with {
    data: {
        name: 'name',
        items: items,
        length: length,
        isTitleHiddenOnTablet: false,
        isSuggestion: true
    }
} only %}

defines.name: data
defines.contract:
{
    name: required,
    items: required,
    length: required,
    isTitleHiddenOnTablet: true,
    isSuggestion: false
}
